1659310.name: The Lord of the Parties Demo
1659310.description:
The lord of the parties is a brand new game that combines an RPG with a party shoot 'em up. Explore this unique fantasy world with your own allies!


Features


Party system: Defeat monsters with various allies you meet during your journey.
Landmass: You can encounter different battles depend on where you are.
Allies: Save other heroes and make your party powerful.
Various quests: Complete several missions that NPCs give.
Gears: You can promote your heroes' tiers with gears.
Crafting: Collect materials and make gears you need.
